title: Let us play a Game! It's called...
body:
Every Champion Is Equal and Need Skins.

1. Name Only One Champ That You Think Has Not Received A Skin In A Very Long Time!

2.Rate the possibility of that champion receiving a skin next year!(1/10)

3.Type your summoner name and your main.

4.And finally how badly do you want that champion to get a skin. (1/10)

Answer in this format
1.Champion
2. x/10
3. Summoner Name/Main Champion
4.x/10

This is just a guideline to make it easy for people to read and so maybe riot can read what we said easy and consider one of our ideas. But as long as you put the answers down that's cool too. 

Oh and please Upvote! #MoreUpvotes = #RiotNotices

replies.body:
Illaoi
10/10
this account/Illaoi
11/10

Oldest champ with 1 skin, she is due for one sooner or later.  I just hope its actually good and not a purple chroma like her release skin.

1. Miss Fortune (haven't played the game for that long) 
2. -10/10 Heartseeker... 
3. The Dreamwalker / Miss Fortune 
4. 100/10 

Yea, I know I broke the scales.
